bibl.title: Portals to Eternity. The Necropolis at Terenouthis in Lower Egypt. The University of Michigan's Reconnaissance Expedition to Kom Abou Billou, the Necropolis of Ancient Terenouthis .
bibl.note: In conjunction with the exhibition: Portals to Eternity, held at the Kelsey Museum from September, 1987 to January, 1988.

McCleary Roger V., Portals to Eternity. The Necropolis at Terenouthis in Lower Egypt. The University of Michigan's Reconnaissance Expedition to Kom Abou Billou, the Necropolis of Ancient Terenouthis (March to April 1935).
Ann Arbor, The University of Michigan, Kelsey Museum of Archaeology, 1987, 4°, vi-15 pp., 1 portrait, 25 figg., 1 carte.
